page.title: 08Community Centre:Sompting
page.content: Inside the Leisure cenre there is a cafe.3 snooker tables,4 squash courts ,6 badminton counts.3 table tennis tables,1 6-a-side football hall and 6 changing rooms.It is a good place for old people to go and use the facilities there. {Community Centre:Sompting} This building was originally Sompting Village School.Harriet Johnson was Headmistress of the school from 1897 to 1910. She took charge of the schoolat the age of 26,having been bor in london in 1871. She had taught in Willesden,London for eight years before moving to Sompting with her mother and sister, Emily, who was to take charge of the infant department. She wrote many articles and books about her teaching methods and she encoured the enjoyment of learning by visits and drama.
